top_comments.comment: I hope world war z aftermath can also be include in firearms expert reacts
Maybe John could do a review of the classic Xbox game BLACK. i think it has one of the most realistic firearms

comments_since_last_sample.body: May we possibly see guns from the game "Scum" i think they are really well done and would like to see them reviewed please?

the more I watch this the more the game devs decided that tilting the gun on the side for hip firing bugs me. its never help with accuracy except the one fluke episode of myth busters where they shot  two hand guns sideways at the same time.
Maybe John could do a review of the classic Xbox game BLACK. i think it has one of the most realistic firearms
at 20:10 you can see the holes in the M16
As a designer I would guess that the tilting is a systemic design decision to prevent the gun model eating too much screen space when you are shooting at a group of enemies on a lower elevation.
